Two friends reused a prime while generating RSA keys. Both encrypted the same message. Can you recover the flag from their shared mistake? ciphertext1: 265454854042359299714346429922746162685854745003997128433613155100346766537034863435052792117758117244324910968912311872926195891407028690686981236498205499296320360926526681838952076647147788822665072524552386742590999762345406378, ciphertext2: 129127358685109401704810393930353795459409014299774356241369095349373900551977858711757606542994473121755421847681786791197403015611027484308902430875578344612584450254072523376975407492077257114313695241355207324160154915256384758

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=424516429233609518138428361424188724325240904299168227140030962331386663896993874780493082355610796367065215436221705730465760489078063391447882412587208893794264331105595906686230528931597261560960473123494084855781299868262195049, n2=491532132816741275241159718049785590323802433233268651019576835544808364678973555002101698041472756535129482613148741762394984282247280383884914441391389963036574929709731773698687513481109951931785044474264822143523252445508477421, e=114551056744672498137962858545080667116697700827951829638504704582627051139623203159273503701855186428496076483926525808801669386023769481745952905660639305158561536819437171897767997591634896623152539088205018486694536033585343007

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{jo263vsl}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 265454854042359299714346429922746162685854745003997128433613155100346766537034863435052792117758117244324910968912311872926195891407028690686981236498205499296320360926526681838952076647147788822665072524552386742590999762345406378, ciphertext2: 129127358685109401704810393930353795459409014299774356241369095349373900551977858711757606542994473121755421847681786791197403015611027484308902430875578344612584450254072523376975407492077257114313695241355207324160154915256384758
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=424516429233609518138428361424188724325240904299168227140030962331386663896993874780493082355610796367065215436221705730465760489078063391447882412587208893794264331105595906686230528931597261560960473123494084855781299868262195049, n2=491532132816741275241159718049785590323802433233268651019576835544808364678973555002101698041472756535129482613148741762394984282247280383884914441391389963036574929709731773698687513481109951931785044474264822143523252445508477421, e=114551056744672498137962858545080667116697700827951829638504704582627051139623203159273503701855186428496076483926525808801669386023769481745952905660639305158561536819437171897767997591634896623152539088205018486694536033585343007
extra_info: p=21228629832110347131332512585003572649305867831384840461132584986640212307426959122054308644902945222909178445598587, q=19997354167035666810992877690949166206112437798871728784075583869381133792115407627810857558889495314779921450763627, r=24579858350811224599697295932424930362940229575475184565878768172830194129958893442329301215300562242934980730582023, φ(n1)=424516429233609518138428361424188724325240904299168227140030962331386663896993874780493082355610796367065215436221664504481761343064121066057606459848353475488634074536350698517374507585497719194210607957290292415243610768365832836, φ(n2)=491532132816741275241159718049785590323802433233268651019576835544808364678973555002101698041472756535129482613148697185182466435355869693711291067294820910369200582796381819346645302153187877630714904315490632085965537543327131772
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
